entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard developing this evening. Periods of light snow near the Ogilvie mountains early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
